title: This movie has everything you can expect!
review: This movie is great fun! The Performances are wonderful! Nicolas Cage and Sean Connery are the best on screen-duo ever. There's great action...and it's not just action, it's more than that.This movie is dramatic, funny,  has the best soundtrack ever (Hans Zimmer, Harry Gregson-Williams, Nick Glennie Smith and a bunch of excellent actors/actresses. Everybody should see this movie...everyone...you won't be disappointed...
